original_text: Each of you should think carefully and then decide how much you can give. Then you will not be sad to give that money. Nobody has made you give it. God loves someone who is happy to give help to other people.
korean_text: 각각 그 마음에 정한 대로 할 것이요 인색함으로나 억지로 하지 말지니 하나님은 즐겨 내는 자를 사랑하시느니라

sentences.original_text: Each of you should think carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각 사람은 신중하게 생각해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and then decide how much you can give
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 얼마나 줄 수 있는지 결정해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then you will not be sad to give that money
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 돈을 주면서 슬퍼하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody has made you give it
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 너희에게 그것을 주도록 강요하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: God loves someone who is happy to give help to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 다른 사람을 돕는 것을 기뻐하는 사람을 사랑하십니다
